content.en: Triage Innovation: Researchers have developed and validated a new triage instrument called the Emergency Severity Index (ESI), which reliably and accurately stratifies patients into different groups in multiple emergency departments. The ESI algorithm has been successfully implemented and refined by triage nurses based on their feedback. It has also been found to predict emergency department resource consumption and improve desirable outcomes in the emergency department.
content.da: Triage Innovation: Forskere har udviklet og valideret et nyt triageinstrument kaldet Emergency Severity Index (ESI), som pålideligt og præcist stratificerer patienter i forskellige grupper i flere akutmodtagelser. ESI-algoritmen er blevet succesfuldt implementeret og forbedret af triagesygeplejersker baseret på deres feedback. Det er også blevet konstateret, at algoritmen forudsiger ressourceforbrug i akutmodtagelsen og forbedrer ønskværdige resultater i akutmodtagelsen.
